name: Toptal
tagline: Hire the top 3% of freelance talent.
description:
Toptal is an elite network of the world's top talent in business, design, and technology that enables companies to scale their teams, on demand. We are problem solvers who value integrity and connect progressive organizations to the talent economy.
Through its global private network, Toptal can rapidly match top quality talent for critical development, project or product management, design, and finance projects, within 24 hours.
We craft individually tailored solutions and partner with clients on everything from large-scale application delivery with full teams to smaller projects supported by specialized experts.
